The recommended configuration changes to achieve 4K instances are as follows. (what is reason to scale the configuration changes??)
Change the directory. The nova.conf.j2 is present in following directories:cd /home/stack/helion/hos/ansible/roles/nova-common/templates
Edit the DEFAULT section in nova.conf.j2 file as below:[DEFAULT] rpc_responce_timeout = 180 server_down_time = 300 report_interval = 30
Commit your configuration cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "<commit message>"
Prepare your environment for deployment:ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost ready-deployment.yml; cd /home/stack/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible;
Execute nova reconfigure playbook.ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts nova-reconfigure.yml
